name: boat-detector
description: A GBDX task that detects boats. Boats include ships, vessels, and all types of watercraft.

inputPortDescriptors.name: ms_image
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains a 4/8-band multispectral image in geotiff format. This directory should only contain one image, otherwise a file is selected arbitrarily.

inputPortDescriptors.name: ps_image
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains the pansharpened counterpart of the multispectal image in geotiff format. This directory should only contain one image, otherwise a file will be selected arbitrarily.

outputPortDescriptors.name: results
outputPortDescriptors.description: Contains a geojson with the boat bounding boxes.
